Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 82nd overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/3/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,992,857 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,992,857 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,992,857 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
10/3/2018: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $11,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/23/2021 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Atlanta to Cincinnati on 6/10/2021 (Going to ATL: P Albert Clothier. Going to CIN: P Richard Maddocks)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 5/11/2022 (Going to HOU: P John Henriques, 2B Steven Mora, 3B Edward Washington, P Richard Maddocks, P Tony Amaral. Going to CIN: CF Craig Parkhill)...
8/4/2022: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $12,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had first career hit (double) on 8/26/2022, off Samuel Rost (SEA)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/1/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 2/22/2027.
